forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 21. Wind chill values as low as -7. West wind 6 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 4. Wind chill values as low as -7. West wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Boston, a crisp morning welcomes us, the sun gliding over rooftops and casting a gentle light on the quiet streets. Today, expect a mix of blue skies and scattered clouds, though the chill of the air holds a bite that is hard to ignore. With the high reaching near 21 degrees, it is essential to acknowledge that the wind chill will feel even colder, plunging to frosty degrees that remind us winter is still firmly entrenched in its reign. As the day transitions into the evening, temperatures will dip to a low around 4 degrees, an invitation to bundle up in layers to ward off the cold as the stars begin to glitter in the darkened sky.

Given the brisk nature of the day, a sensible wardrobe embraces warmth; thick coats, scarves, and gloves become your loyal companions. The soft crunch of snow beneath boots invites simple joys, perhaps a leisurely stroll in the nearby parks, where the scenic beauty of the season unfolds in every glance. Alternatively, find comfort indoors—a cozy café with a steaming cup of coffee would be a delightful refuge, permitting one to watch the world pass by, framed against the shimmering backdrop of winter. It is a day to savor the moments, whether you're wrapped snugly at home or exploring the quiet nooks of this historic city, taking the chill in stride.
